    private java.util.LinkedList<Card> Deck.deck  
    java.util.ArrayList<Card> Entity.HAND
    An ArrayList of Card objects that represents the cards in the hand of a player
    static java.util.LinkedList<Card> Game.pile
    Field containing the discard pile where the Cards played are discarded
    Methods in model that return Card
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) Card Deck.draw()
    Removes and returns the first Card in the deck.
    static Card Card.pathToCard​(java.lang.String s)
    Returns the Card object corresponding to the Sting s, which should be the path of a jpg image inside the cardImages directory

    Changes the color of the played card if its a card that can change color.
    void Game.Ai.play​(Card discard)
    Makes the Ai play their turn.
    void Game.playerPlay​(Card discard)
    Checks if the human player plays a valid Card according to the rules and if it is the card is put in the pile and its effect is activated.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Deck.refill​(java.util.List<Card> pile)
    The Deck is refilled with the Cards in pile, until pile is empty
